metadata.Title: CVE-2022-41849 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: drivers/video/fbdev/smscufx.c in the Linux kernel through 5.19.12 has arace condition and resultant use-after-free if a physically proximateattacker removes a USB device while calling open(), aka a race conditionbetween ufx_ops_open and ufx_usb_disconnect.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
